chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Bless the LORD, O my soul. O LORD my God, thou art very great; thou art clothed with honour and majesty.
items.plainText: Bless the LORD, O my soul. O LORD my God, thou art very great; thou art clothed with honour and majesty.

items.text: Who coverest thyself with light as with a garment: who stretchest out the heavens like a curtain:
items.plainText: Who coverest thyself with light as with a garment: who stretchest out the heavens like a curtain:

items.text: Who layeth the beams of his chambers in the waters: who maketh the clouds his chariot: who walketh upon the wings of the wind:
items.plainText: Who layeth the beams of his chambers in the waters: who maketh the clouds his chariot: who walketh upon the wings of the wind:

items.text: Who maketh his angels spirits; his ministers a flaming fire:
items.plainText: Who maketh his angels spirits; his ministers a flaming fire:

items.text: Who laid the foundations of the earth, that it should not be removed for ever.
items.plainText: Who laid the foundations of the earth, that it should not be removed for ever.

items.text: Thou coveredst it with the deep as with a garment: the waters stood above the mountains.
items.plainText: Thou coveredst it with the deep as with a garment: the waters stood above the mountains.

items.text: At thy rebuke they fled; at the voice of thy thunder they hasted away.
items.plainText: At thy rebuke they fled; at the voice of thy thunder they hasted away.

items.text: They go up by the mountains; they go down by the valleys unto the place which thou hast founded for them.
items.plainText: They go up by the mountains; they go down by the valleys unto the place which thou hast founded for them.

items.text: Thou hast set a bound that they may not pass over; that they turn not again to cover the earth.
items.plainText: Thou hast set a bound that they may not pass over; that they turn not again to cover the earth.

items.text: He sendeth the springs into the valleys, which run among the hills.
items.plainText: He sendeth the springs into the valleys, which run among the hills.

items.text: They give drink to every beast of the field: the wild asses quench their thirst.
items.plainText: They give drink to every beast of the field: the wild asses quench their thirst.

items.text: By them shall the fowls of the heaven have their habitation, which sing among the branches.
items.plainText: By them shall the fowls of the heaven have their habitation, which sing among the branches.

items.text: He watereth the hills from his chambers: the earth is satisfied with the fruit of thy works.
items.plainText: He watereth the hills from his chambers: the earth is satisfied with the fruit of thy works.

items.text: He causeth the grass to grow for the cattle, and herb for the service of man: that he may bring forth food out of the earth;
items.plainText: He causeth the grass to grow for the cattle, and herb for the service of man: that he may bring forth food out of the earth;

items.text: And wine that maketh glad the heart of man, and oil to make his face to shine, and bread which strengtheneth man's heart.
items.plainText: And wine that maketh glad the heart of man, and oil to make his face to shine, and bread which strengtheneth man's heart.

items.text: The trees of the LORD are full of sap; the cedars of Lebanon, which he hath planted;
items.plainText: The trees of the LORD are full of sap; the cedars of Lebanon, which he hath planted;

items.text: Where the birds make their nests: as for the stork, the fir trees are her house.
items.plainText: Where the birds make their nests: as for the stork, the fir trees are her house.

items.text: The high hills are a refuge for the wild goats; and the rocks for the conies.
items.plainText: The high hills are a refuge for the wild goats; and the rocks for the conies.

items.text: He appointed the moon for seasons: the sun knoweth his going down.
items.plainText: He appointed the moon for seasons: the sun knoweth his going down.

items.text: Thou makest darkness, and it is night: wherein all the beasts of the forest do creep forth.
items.plainText: Thou makest darkness, and it is night: wherein all the beasts of the forest do creep forth.

items.text: The young lions roar after their prey, and seek their meat from God.
items.plainText: The young lions roar after their prey, and seek their meat from God.

items.text: The sun ariseth, they gather themselves together, and lay them down in their dens.
items.plainText: The sun ariseth, they gather themselves together, and lay them down in their dens.

items.text: Man goeth forth unto his work and to his labour until the evening.
items.plainText: Man goeth forth unto his work and to his labour until the evening.

items.text: O LORD, how manifold are thy works! in wisdom hast thou made them all: the earth is full of thy riches.
items.plainText: O LORD, how manifold are thy works! in wisdom hast thou made them all: the earth is full of thy riches.

items.text: So is this great and wide sea, wherein are things creeping innumerable, both small and great beasts.
items.plainText: So is this great and wide sea, wherein are things creeping innumerable, both small and great beasts.

items.text: There go the ships: there is that leviathan, whom thou hast made to play therein.
items.plainText: There go the ships: there is that leviathan, whom thou hast made to play therein.

items.text: These wait all upon thee; that thou mayest give them their meat in due season.
items.plainText: These wait all upon thee; that thou mayest give them their meat in due season.

items.text: That thou givest them they gather: thou openest thine hand, they are filled with good.
items.plainText: That thou givest them they gather: thou openest thine hand, they are filled with good.

items.text: Thou hidest thy face, they are troubled: thou takest away their breath, they die, and return to their dust.
items.plainText: Thou hidest thy face, they are troubled: thou takest away their breath, they die, and return to their dust.

items.text: Thou sendest forth thy spirit, they are created: and thou renewest the face of the earth.
items.plainText: Thou sendest forth thy spirit, they are created: and thou renewest the face of the earth.

items.text: The glory of the LORD shall endure for ever: the LORD shall rejoice in his works.
items.plainText: The glory of the LORD shall endure for ever: the LORD shall rejoice in his works.

items.text: He looketh on the earth, and it trembleth: he toucheth the hills, and they smoke.
items.plainText: He looketh on the earth, and it trembleth: he toucheth the hills, and they smoke.

items.text: I will sing unto the LORD as long as I live: I will sing praise to my God while I have my being.
items.plainText: I will sing unto the LORD as long as I live: I will sing praise to my God while I have my being.

items.text: My meditation of him shall be sweet: I will be glad in the LORD.
items.plainText: My meditation of him shall be sweet: I will be glad in the LORD.

items.text: Let the sinners be consumed out of the earth, and let the wicked be no more. Bless thou the LORD, O my soul. Praise ye the LORD.
items.plainText: Let the sinners be consumed out of the earth, and let the wicked be no more. Bless thou the LORD, O my soul. Praise ye the LORD.
